thread.title: Chloe Khan enjoys a saucy sauna in nothing but lacy lingerie (and shares it on Snapchat, of course!)
thread.title_full: Chloe Khan enjoys a saucy sauna in nothing but lacy lingerie (and shares it on Snapchat, of course!)

author: Lara Martin
title: Chloe Khan enjoys a saucy sauna in nothing but lacy lingerie (and shares it on Snapchat, of course!)
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She runs a successful webcam business so it’s fair to say Chloe Khan knows a thing or two about attracting attention on camera. 
And the Celebrity Big Brother star demonstrated that yesterday by sharing a saucy Snapchat of herself wearing nothing but lacy lingerie as she enjoyed a steamy sauna with equally scantily clad friends. 
The brunette – who once auditioned for X Factor - is something of an internet sensation thanks to her racy social media posts showing off her surgically-enhanced body and flashy lifestyle. Chloe wore racy lingerie for her sauna (Photo: Snapchat/Chloe Khan) She's not afraid to flaunt her assets (Photo: Snapchat/Chloe Khan) Chloe's pal poses for the camera (Photo: Snapchat/Chloe Khan) Read More CBB's highest paid housemates revealed amid claims Speidi will get $700,000 for return to show 
Chloe, 25, previously modelled for Playboy and became the international face of strip club chain Spearmint Rhino. 
Now the self-made millionaire runs a popular webcam business and boasted last year she can make £50 a minute it that’s good. 
"The webcam girl thing you can go online, group or private, set your own price and guys can come in and chat to you. You can set it for £5 a minute. If you’ve got ten people that's £50 a minute, so it’s really good money," she said last year. Chloe can do pared back as well (Photo: Snapchat/Chloe Khan) Chloe's a frequent fixture on Snapchat Read More Glamour model Chloe Khan goes make-up free for unusually-tame selfie 
"You are going to get the guy who is horny and wants you to do the sexy chat, or you’re going to get the guy who is lonely and wants to talk about his allotment. It is literally so random and so weird." 
She also insisted there's more to her than meets the eye. 
"There is a lot more to me than just a pair of boobs, I mean my boobs are big and my boobs are fabulous, but I’m fabulous too," she said on TV show Selfie Addicts. 
"People see me and think, such a bimbo or such a barbie or a total airhead, t**t on a stick and not anything else." Chloe struggling to contain her assets at CBB last year (Photo: Karwai Tang/WireImage) Striking a pose on Instagram (Photo: chloe.khan/instagram) 
And it’s clear Chloe is very proud of her sultry appearance. 
She had something of a meltdown on new TV show Celebrity 100% Hotter recently after volunteering to strip back her glam look for a subtle make-under. 
After seeing her new pared back look, she said: "I f**king hate it, I’m sorry, but I do hate it. I think it’s really, really bad. 
“You’ve slayed the makeup, he’s slayed the hair, and she’s slayed the outfit. 
“But, on me, it’s really ugly and I want to cut the head off. 
“If I seen that walking down the street, I would not think she’s pretty. I look 40 years old, I look like Carol Vorderman .” Read More
